mental ray interface Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
mi::shader::Access_fb Smart pointer to access Framebuffer class, no editing
mi::shader::Edit_fb Smart pointer to access Framebuffer class for editing
mi::shader::Framebuffer Framebuffer class
mi::shader::Interface Top level C++ mental ray interface extensions
mi::shader::LightIterator Iterate over shader or instance light lists
mi::shader::LightList Light lists, used internally by LightIterator
mi::shader::Options Access to string options
